summary: The diff only shows a metadata update in project_state.json acknowledging REQ-1 as a pending feature request. No actual code changes were made to implement the requirement. The print view page (PrintViewPage.tsx) was not modified to exclude screenshot functionality.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the print view page (PrintViewPage.tsx) does not display or trigger any screenshot functionality when rendering bills
missing_requirements.reason: No implementation changes detected. The diff only shows project_state.json metadata updates marking the requirement as 'pending'. No modifications to PrintViewPage.tsx or related components to exclude screenshot functionality.
